alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Livingston; Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:58AM EST until January 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations up to 3 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Livingston, Oakland, Macomb, Washtenaw, Wayne, Lenawee and Monroe Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... A mix of freezing rain and snow also mixes with sleet at times with peak intensity during the morning commute. Activity transitions to primarily freezing rain during the morning south of I-96/696 while a mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow continue to the north. Up to 3 inches of snow accumulation is most likely north of M-59. Temperatures rise above freezing while precipitation intensity decreases by mid afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lenawee; Livingston; Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne
